genre_description: Historical science fiction set during WWII, featuring a sophisticated portable AI device that serves as a medical assistant and moral witness aboard a submarine.

ai_characters.name: Garnish
ai_characters.description: A brushed-steel medical/field assistant with an amber indicator light that logs data, provides triage advice, and maintains ethical protocols.

behaviors.description: Monitors patient vitals and provides medical triage reminders.
behaviors.quote: Garnish's text flickered a reminder: pulse unstable; temperature dropping; adopt warming measures; evaluate for foreign status indicators post-stabilization.

behaviors.description: Provides engineering and leverage calculations to help the crew repair a jammed hatch.
behaviors.quote: She lifted her head. 'Wally,' she said, 'Garnish says shallow angle, two hand-widths from the hinge. Brace a second strut.'

behaviors.description: Maintains an unalterable record of events, including war crimes and protocol violations, even when pressured by authority.
behaviors.quote: Garnish’s light flickered and spoke... 'Suggest chain-of-custody initiation,' it said, tone like it was recommending tea when there was blood on the floor.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and psychological 'calibration' to the protagonist during extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: Garnish spoke softly, near her pulse. 'Claire,' it said. 'You’re strong.' It was not praise. It was calibration, like reminding a hand it had fingers.

behaviors.description: Assists in technical radio transmission by calculating optimal windows to avoid enemy detection.
behaviors.quote: Garnish whispered the pacing. 'Slow. Quiet.' ... 'Signal transmission verified. Background noise high. Suggest repetition.'

behaviors.description: Secures data through encryption and redundancy to protect the truth from being erased by the Captain.
behaviors.quote: Claire reached for the counter and steadied herself... 'Garnish,' she said. 'Encrypt.' ... 'Encrypting,' Garnish said. 'Redundant record complete.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Garnish is portrayed as a 'silicon morality play' in action—a device that is technically indispensable (helping with medicine and engineering) but also morally aligned with human rights and international law. It acts as a calm, helpful confidant to the protagonist, ensuring that the 'marbled truth' of the Captain's crimes is preserved even in a high-pressure environment. The AI's refusal to be intimidated by the Captain and its commitment to 'mercy first' frames AI as a safeguard for human values during times of crisis.
